We‚Äôre committed to making Scotland the best place in the world to grow up.

üîπ ¬£567 million to deliver 1,140 hours of early learning and childcare

#ScotBudget https://t.co/7KvXpzbfQp

We‚Äôll invest around ¬£1.1 billion in jobs and skills:

üîπ 100% rates relief continues for retail, hospitality, leisure and aviation for at least next 3 months from April

üîπ Funding for tourism and hospitality recovery

üîπ Creating ¬£7million network for tech start-ups

#ScotBudget https://t.co/s1mqGjp1BE

Digital connectivity has never been more important.

#ScotBudget https://t.co/Eqd8DY5198

We will continue to support Scotland‚Äôs families by investing:

üîπ ¬£68 million for the first full year of the Scottish Child Payment, to help tackle child poverty

üîπ Nearly ¬£712 million for affordable housing 

#ScotBudget https://t.co/GXgzqdhKro

We‚Äôre investing in green jobs for a sustainable Scotland:

üîπ An ¬£100 million Green Jobs Fund over the next Parliament, helping businesses develop sustainable products and create jobs

#ScotBudget https://t.co/m9mbRK3xRH

We know how important it is to support family budgets, so:

#ScotBudget https://t.co/1z6shfKrno

Our budget proposes ¬£11.6 billion for local government.

‚¨Ü This includes an increase of over ¬£335.6 million in core revenue funding, plus ¬£259 million in one-off funding.

#ScotBudget https://t.co/ry7CshFk9S

We‚Äôre continuing to make it easier for people to choose sustainable ways to travel.

üîπ Over ¬£100 million on active travel, including large-scale infrastructure projects and access to bikes

#ScotBudget https://t.co/MPSsx9ilRt

We want everyone in Scotland to be safe in their homes and communities.
